trans-unit.source: Azure WebJobs documentation resources
trans-unit.target: Azure WebJobs documentation resources

trans-unit.source: Recommended resources for learning how to use Azure WebJobs and the Azure WebJobs SDK.
trans-unit.target: Recommended resources for learning how to use Azure WebJobs and the Azure WebJobs SDK.

trans-unit.source: Azure WebJobs documentation resources
trans-unit.target: Azure WebJobs documentation resources

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This topic links to documentation resources about how to use Azure WebJobs and the Azure WebJobs SDK.
trans-unit.target: This topic links to documentation resources about how to use Azure WebJobs and the Azure WebJobs SDK.

trans-unit.source: Azure WebJobs provide an easy way to run scripts or programs as background processes on [App Service Web Apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714).
trans-unit.target: Azure WebJobs provide an easy way to run scripts or programs as background processes on [App Service Web Apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714).

trans-unit.source: You can upload and run an executable file such as as cmd, bat, exe (.NET), ps1, sh, php, py, js and jar.
trans-unit.target: You can upload and run an executable file such as as cmd, bat, exe (.NET), ps1, sh, php, py, js and jar.

trans-unit.source: These programs run as WebJobs on a schedule (cron) or continuously.
trans-unit.target: These programs run as WebJobs on a schedule (cron) or continuously.

trans-unit.source: The WebJobs SDK makes it easier to use Azure Storage.
trans-unit.target: The WebJobs SDK makes it easier to use Azure Storage.

trans-unit.source: The WebJobs SDK has a binding and trigger system which works with Microsoft Azure Storage Blobs, Queues and Tables as well as Service Bus Queues.
trans-unit.target: The WebJobs SDK has a binding and trigger system which works with Microsoft Azure Storage Blobs, Queues and Tables as well as Service Bus Queues.

trans-unit.source: Creating, deploying, and managing WebJobs is seamless with integrated tooling in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Creating, deploying, and managing WebJobs is seamless with integrated tooling in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: You can create WebJobs from templates, publish, and manage (run/stop/monitor/debug) them.
trans-unit.target: You can create WebJobs from templates, publish, and manage (run/stop/monitor/debug) them.

trans-unit.source: The WebJobs dashboard in the Azure portal provides powerful management capabilities that give you full control over the execution of WebJobs, including the ability to invoke individual functions within WebJobs.
trans-unit.target: The WebJobs dashboard in the Azure portal provides powerful management capabilities that give you full control over the execution of WebJobs, including the ability to invoke individual functions within WebJobs.

trans-unit.source: The dashboard also displays function runtimes and logging output.
trans-unit.target: The dashboard also displays function runtimes and logging output.
